text: Wilma Jeanne Cooper (or just Jeanne Cooper; October 25, 1928 - May 8, 2013) was an American actress. She was best known for her Emmy Award-winning role as Katherine Chancellor on CBS' soap opera The Young and the Restless. She was a long serving television actress. Cooper was born in Taft, California on October 25, 1928. She was raised in Bakersfield, California. Cooper was married to Harry Bernsen, Jr. from 1954 until they divorced in 1977. They had three children, including actor Corbin Bernsen. Cooper died on May 8, 2013 from complications from COPD in Los Angeles, California, aged 84.Jeanne Cooper Young and the Restless veteran dies at 84 at TV Fanatic.com ==References== ==Other websites== * * Jeanne Cooper bio on The Young and the Restless CBS website * Jeanne Cooper Obituary Category:Actors from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Deaths from COPD Category:1928 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Jeanne Cooper
